thread.title: Perfect location to explore Paris
thread.title_full: Perfect location to explore Paris - Review of Libertel Gare du Nord Suede, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: portprincess
title: Perfect location to explore Paris
text:
We loved the location with many fantastic restaurants, bars and bakeries in the vicinity. In addition the hotel was very close to the Gar du Nord train station, making it a highly convenient base for us .
Yes the room was small but it had everything we needed and was lovely and cosy.
Of special note was the excellent customer service offered to us by Daniel at reception. He was so helpful and gave us great advice on how to get around exploring Paris.
Highly recommended
